attributes.action: Scrap the New NHS Dental Contract
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The New NHS dental contract was imposed on April 1st 2006. It was untried and untested in the form it was implemented. It is unfair to both dentists and patients alike.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the New NHS Dental Contract."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11547.asp

Prime Minister's Office
